data.title: How to use Netflix on your iPhone, iPad, or iPod touch
data.meta_description: To set up Netflix, go to the App Store, search for the Netflix app, and download it. Then open the app to sign in and start using Netflix.
data.text:
The Netflix app is available on iPhone, iPad, and iPod touch with iOS 16 or later, and is compatible with devices with iOS 5 or later that have already downloaded the Netflix app.

To connect your iPhone, iPad, or iPod touch to your Netflix account, start from the home screen and follow the steps below.

Open the App Store.

Select Search.

Type Netflix in the Search bar and tap the Search button.

Select the Netflix search result.

Select Get or tap the Cloud icon.

If you are missing the option to install the Netflix app, follow these troubleshooting steps.

Tap the Netflix icon on the Home screen.

Enter your Netflix email address and password.

Select Sign In.

Your device is now connected to your Netflix account.
